abstract: Gay and transgender Catholics send formal letter to Pope Francis, requesting that he meet with them during his first visit to United States; argue that church faces 'pastoral crisis' over gay issues and will urge Francis to fully include members of gay and transgender communities in the church.
lead_paragraph: A large group seeks to meet the pope during his first visit to the United States, in September, to urge him to fully include gay and transgender Catholics in the church.

headline.main: Gay and Transgender Catholics Urge Pope Francis to Take a Stand
headline.print_headline: Gay and Transgender Catholics Make Plea to Pope

snippet: A large group seeks to meet the pope during his first visit to the United States, in September, to urge him to fully include gay and transgender Catholics in the church.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
